name: Alone with your Demons
description:
Early prototype for the Super Social Distance Game Jam  2020

Alone with your Demons is a game about learning to deal with yourself. Stuck at home alone, the player is surrounded by their demons which take various forms. Designed with the Seven Deadly Sins in mind, the player must confront each demon by defeating them in specialized mini games. When confronting Greed, for example, the player must bet their own points and choose between randomly valued packages to reach a target value range in a bizarre take on Black Jack. The player should also be careful not to give into their own greed and lose it all. The overall goal is to overcome impulses and defeat all the demons. The problem being, giving in is just too much fun.
